Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cards.ConcreteCommonCards

Class CommonGoalCard2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cards.CommonGoalCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cards.ConcreteCommonCards.CommonGoalCard2
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CommonGoalCard2 extends CommonGoalCard
This class contains the algorithm to verify if the following common goal is satisfied. The goal is: Four groups each containing at least 4 tiles of the same type (not necessarily in the depicted shape). The tiles of one group can be different from those of another group.
Author:
Alberto Aniballi
